summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MOKALE 6pcs Plastic Butterfly Hair Clamps-Non-Slip Chic Styling Claw Hairgrip for Women and Girls-Professional Chunky Prong Teeth Bows Jaw Hair Clips For Thick Hair (Black)
Review Date: 2017/08/10
Store: Mokale
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mokale', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 4 x 1.4 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '714757389126'}
Review Text: These are actually much better than the clips I bought from Sally's. These are bigger and the "teeth" are more intense = they are capable or holding much more hair and also the hair stays in place better and more firmly. I am really happy with these.
Review Title: Better than reg clips
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Zenith Classic Pink Lace Front Wigs for Party Fashion Cute Baby Pink Long Wavy Hair Synthetic Beautiful Wig for Women Mixed Color Pastel Pink Wig Light Purple & Orange Fiber 24 inches
Review Date: 2018/05/10
Store: Zenith
Product Description: ['ABOUT A LACE FRONT WIG /b>  A lace wig is called lace wig because of the way it is made, when you wear it and part your hair, the wig looks very natural, like the hair is growing from the scalp, it is therefore better and looks more realistic than ordinary wigs, once you wear them, the create a flawless, natural and invisible hairline.  Lace front wigs are fabulous because they give the impression that the hair is growing from one’s natural fringe line, their design is such that you are able to style your hair away from your face. Lace front wig are easy to install, you can use them for daily wear or for extended wear depending on how you attached them using glue or hair pins, they also look like natural hair with gradual transition from sparsely spread thin hair to densely spread to thick hair.  Another advantage of lace front wigs is that they can be curled, braided or even twisted , and you can make an assortment of looks from one wig, however they are easily damaged without a maintenance especially if it is worn regularly.']
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13 x 7.4 x 1.6 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HX-004', 'UPC': '715691813944', 'Manufacturer': 'Zenith'}
Review Text: I got this wig as a present for my wife and she loves it. It’s really fun and it looks great. Looks especially good under hats like shown in the photo.
Review Title: Looks great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Plovex Waterproof Microblading Eyebrow Tattoo Pen 4 Head Fine Sketch Enhancer Fork Tip Eyebrow Tattoo Tint Eyebrow Gel Pencil Makeup (01 Light brown)
Review Date: 2018/11/28
Store: Plovex
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Plovex', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 0.6 x 0.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '759865789802'}
Review Text: This stayed on really well and is actually waterproof. Yesterday, I put it on my hand as well and have washed it multiple times and it’s still there!
Review Title: Impressive staying power
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DUCREW Kids Bath Bombs with Surprise Toys Inside,12 XL Natural and Organic Bath Bombs Gift Sets for Kids/Boys/Girls/Women to Moisturize Skin, Natural and Safe For Kids
Review Date: 2019/10/07
Store: DUCREW
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DUCREW', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Unit Count': '12 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '11.42 x 7.87 x 1.5 inches; 3.65 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'Baby Bath Bombs', 'UPC': '778365610935', 'Manufacturer': 'DUCREW'}
Review Text: These are really cute. My 3 y o is obsessed w bath bombs so I was excited about these. The toys r cute. They smell lovely and I like the ingredients. I do think they are a bit pricey but when we bought the bath bombs w toys in them at the store, they were $2.50 each so this seems about right
Review Title: My daughter loves
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Organic Self Tanner for Face and Body - Streak Free Sunless Tanner - Self Tanning Lotion with Manuka Honey and Aloe Vera - Fake Tan for Fair to Medium Skin - Indoor Tanning Lotion with Bronzer (8oz)
Review Date: 2021/04/28
Store: DermaChange
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 3 x 2 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '860004819929'}
Review Text: I have been self tanning for almost 20 years. This did not work for me. I ended up with the steamiest most blotchy results I’ve ever had. It has a little bit of a color guide but that disappears into the skin so it was hard for me to see where I put it.
Review Title: Soooo streaky & blotchy
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:

    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details

    Structure your response as:

    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history reveals several clear preferences and patterns. Firstly, the individual exhibits a favorable sentiment towards hair accessories and beauty products, consistently rating items such as hair clips and wigs highly, suggesting a preference for effective and aesthetically pleasing styles. The positive sentiment towards hair clips is notably higher than the average rating for beauty products, indicating a strong inclination for quality in hairstyling tools.

Common themes surface around enhancement for appearance, with purchases often linked to convenience and transformative use cases, such as achieving stylish looks or creating fun experiences, particularly for personal grooming and children's products. 

Quality preferences lean towards performance and lasting durability, as highlighted by high ratings for waterproof eyebrow products and engaging children’s bath items, albeit with some criticism towards others like self-tanners which failed to meet the expected standard.

In terms of price sensitivity, the individual appears willing to invest in reliable products, as evidenced by their comparison of bath bomb costs, though also questioning value on less effective items. 

Overall, core preferences indicate a strong appreciation for functional beauty products that enhance personal style and experience, coupled with a critical eye regarding product effectiveness and value for money.

target_interaction.title: No pink + No glitter
target_interaction.text:
My daughter has dark blonde hair. This did not show up AT ALL. I couldn’t see pink or glitter. . All it did was make her hair stiff
We tried it on her friend who has WHITE blonde hair, I could see it a little better on her but still VERY subtle
This was a waste of $. Disappointed Bc I normally like this brand
